description: This file defines an ASP.NET Core API controller 'AnalyticsController' which provides endpoints for retrieving analytics data such as summaries and time series charts for a user dashboard. It includes dependency injection, authorization, and OpenAPI annotations.

classes.name: AnalyticsController
classes.description: ASP.NET Core API controller for analytics-related endpoints, handling user authorization, and delegating data retrieval to the injected IAnalyticsService.

methods.name: Summary
methods.description: Asynchronous method that retrieves summary analytics data for the current user, returning an IActionResult.

methods.name: TimeSeries
methods.description: Asynchronous method that retrieves time series chart data for a specified metric and time range for the current user, returning an IActionResult.
